sources.title: Shadowlands | Full Movie | Adventure Thriller | Jess Adams | Jonathan Dane
sources.description:
Shadowlands - When Zach gets a message from his biological father on social media, he and his friends venture to Death Valley to meet him. No one is prepared for what they find.
2020.  Stars: Jess Adams, Bridget Brookman, Jonathan Dane

metadata.Plot: C.S. Lewis (Sir Anthony Hopkins) is the author of the "Chronicles of Narnia" books. Known as Jack, he teaches at Oxford during the 1950s. An American fan, Joy Gresham (Debra Winger), arrives to meet him for tea in Oxford. It is the beginning of a love affair. Tragically, Joy becomes terminally ill and their lives become complicated.
metadata.Actors: Anthony Hopkins, Debra Winger, Julian Fellowes
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 7 wins & 14 nominations total
